name: Ancient Power
description: Ancient powers stir in forgotten places,
waiting for one brave enough to claim them.
Seek out these primordial forces and
harness their energy to become truly powerful.

dialogs.start1: The ancient powers call to those with strong spirits.
dialogs.start2: Such forces are not to be taken lightly, hero.
dialogs.start3: Are you prepared to bind such power to yourself?
dialogs.progress1: The ancient energies respond to your presence.
dialogs.progress2: You are handling these forces with wisdom.
dialogs.complete1: The ancient power now flows through you!
dialogs.complete2: Use this gift wisely, for great power brings great responsibility.
